title: Drawing, "Part Old Wall at Paestum, Olive Trees Growing on It", April 1869
inscribed: In graphite, lower margin, left: Part of old wall / at Paestum / olive trees growing on it / April 1869; lower margin, right: grey stone / and / some orange.
description: View of a part of an old wall with olive trees and mountains in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Part Old Wall at Paestum, Olive Trees Growing on It", April 1869.
April 1869. Graphite on green paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-495-b.
